attributes.action: Bring the death penlty into force for prisoners who will never be allowed out of prison.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to save money generated by tax, bring the death penelty to prisoners who are in prison for life, and who will never be allowed to be released. this will save money and should help the over crowding in prisons.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
